org.mcm.sws.process
Class ProcessInput

java.lang.Object
  org.mcm.sws.process.ProcessInput
public class ProcessInput
extends java.lang.Object

Input needed for instantiating the process. The actual gathering of inputs is left to the process exection engine. In the present implementation, an mesage is prompted to the user at stdout and the input is read via stdin.

Author:
Joachim Peer
